Segment.name: ED
Segment.comment: To identify further the referenced equipment

Field.name: EquipmentInitial
Field.comment: Prefix or alphabetic part of an equipment unit's identifying number

Field.name: EquipmentNumber1
Field.comment: Sequencing or serial part of an equipment unit's identifying number (pure numeric form for equipment number is preferred)

Field.name: LoadEmptyStatusCode
Field.comment: Code which specifies the loaded condition of transportation equipment

Field.name: CommodityCode
Field.comment: Code describing a commodity or group of commodities

Field.name: LadingDescription
Field.comment: Description of an item as required for rating and billing purposes

Field.name: WaybillNumber
Field.comment: Carrier accounting number of the waybill for the inbound movement

Field.name: EquipmentNumber2
Field.comment: Sequencing or serial part of an equipment unit's identifying number (pure numeric form for equipment number is preferred)

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year
